item.description:
You're invited to the first in a series of "play dates" (that is, Open Studio days). NOTE that these Open Studio events are NOT at our usual venue, the Button Box, but at a location in Holliston. The address and phone number will be sent to people who RSVP "yes."

Here are the details.

DAY/TIME: Friday, Nov. 28, noon to 8 p.m. Come for an hour or two; come for the whole day.

AGENDA: No scheduled activities. Arrive and leave when you want. Work on your own projects at your own pace.

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to some tools (paper cutter, heat gun, etc.). Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom.

COST: $5, regardless of how long you stay.

WHO MAY ATTEND: Any member of the NE ATC+ or Altered Art/Assemblage Meetups who has already attended at least one regular Meetup.

WHAT TO BRING: Your own materials and projects to work on (just as you do for the regular Meetup). A few basic supplies--scissors, glue, tape, etc. -- are available for loan.

HOW TO SIGN UP: You must RSVP "yes" using Meetup's RSVP function so we know who's coming and how many to expect. If your plans change, switch your RSVP to no ASAP.

CANCELLATIONS: If you must cancel less than 24 hours in advance -- or after the Open Studio has started -- you should also call the Open Studio host. The host's phone number will be e-mailed to you after you RSVP, along with the Studio address.

If we need to cancel due to weather or for any other reason, we'll post a message here AND e-mail or call anyone who's RSVP'd as far in advance as possible.

And if you can't make it this time, don't fret -- we'll be offering MANY more of these, especially after the holidays.

Looking forward to seeing you!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: ArtStudio 360 Open Studio Day, Holliston, MA
